artist: Artist: Carlos Amorales; Printer: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis; Publisher: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis
creditline: Highpoint Editions Archive, The Friends of Bruce B. Dayton Acquisition Fund and the Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: Eagle head shapes printed 122 times in 8 runs from laser-engraved Plexiglas plates. The plates were inked and wiped intaglio style, relief rolled with transparent black ink, and printed in an overlapping configuration as drawn by the artist.

markings: LLC in pencil: ARCHIVE | Publisher\'s blindstamp, LLC: HP
medium: Intaglio and relief printed from laser-engraved acrylic templates
provenance: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis (publisher); sold to MIA, 2020.
signed: LRC in pencil: C. Amorales 2010 | BC in pencil: Snake Glyph #4
title: Snake Glyph #4
